channel.title: My Armadyl Hilt kinda nulled. [pi]
channel.description:
I didn't notice it, but my players did. A few weeks ago, suddently my armadyll hilt became invisible... I tried to find the Models in itemdef, but ofcourse it isn't in there.
So you guys think this could be fixed by just replacing the models? (Have to figure what Model ID's it are)
Or its server reletated?

It is not the actually godsword, there is nothing wrong with it.
Just the Hilt item
